definition:
the act or process of expanding                                      
             
             territorial expansion
the quality or state of being expanded
the increase in volume of working fluid (such as steam) in an engine cylinder after cutoff or in an internal combustion engine after explosion

something that results from an act of expanding                                      
             
             the book is an expansion of a lecture series
the result of carrying out an indicated mathematical operation : the expression of a function in the form of a series
the act of becoming bigger or of making something bigger : the act of expanding
a more complete and detailed written work or set of comments based on something shorter
the act of growing or increasing : enlargement
the act or process of expanding
in: territorial expansion
economic expansion
expansion of the universe
the book is an expansion of a lecture series
The league is undergoing expansion.
the expansion of a lecture series into a book
This book is an expansion of a lecture series.

definition: the process of increasing in size and filling more space
the process of making a business, organization, or activity grow by including more people, moving into new areas, selling more products etc
something that has more detail or information than something done before
an expression written in a longer form
in: damage caused to buildings through the expansion and contraction of timbers
The company has looked at a number of ways of financing its expansion.
the rapid expansion of private nursing-home care over the last decade
We plan to continue our expansion programme.
His latest work is an expansion of themes foreshadowed in his earlier plays.

definition: the increase of something in size, number, or importance:
an increase in the size, number, or importance of something:
in: the rapid expansion of the software industry
Expansion into new areas of research is possible.
an expansion of industry
The document outlines the planned expansion of the programme across the UK.
airport/business/market expansion
an expansion plan/programme/project
support/allow/encourage expansion
fund/finance expansion
